MD.analysis.reconstruct_lattice

Package MD.analysis.reconstruct_lattice

This module is used to reconstruct the real space lattice from a structure factor q vectors(note this isn't a very reliable method). More...

Functions

def reconstruct_lattice
 \ brief Find the real space basis

Detailed Description

This module is used to reconstruct the real space lattice from a structure factor q vectors(note this isn't a very reliable method).

Function Documentation

def MD.analysis.reconstruct_lattice.reconstruct_lattice (   QQ,
  PM 
)

\ brief Find the real space basis

This method is primitive and unreliable and will most likley only work for simple lattice structures which have only 3 basis vectors

This function also writes out qnumbers.txt which will be an organized list of the |q| as well recipricol.txt which holds the recipricol lattice vectors

Returns:
real space lattice vectors
basis vectors in k space
Parameters:
QQ |q| where q is the primitive vectors in k space
PM primitive vectors q in k space
